decks.notes: The deck focuses on casting as many spells as possible quickly to assemble a combo that can win the game in a single turn, bypassing the opponent's defenses. By utilizing cards that allow for fast mana generation and card draw, the deck aims to quickly play out its entire library and win with Thassa's Oracle or by dealing lethal damage with Goblin Charbelcher. The deck also includes ways to protect its combo with Pact of Negation and disruption with Cabal Therapy. The key is to quickly and decisively win the game before the opponent can stop the combo.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to pressure the opponent and control the board. By utilizing Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play, along with powerful removal like Swords to Plowshares, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while developing its own board presence. Cards like Recruiter of the Guard and Stoneforge Mystic allow for tutoring key creatures and equipment to further enhance the deck's strategy. Additionally, the inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and flexibility in longer games.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while quickly deploying threats of its own to apply pressure. By utilizing a combination of disruption spells like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze, along with efficient removal like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, the deck aims to control the board and prevent the opponent from establishing a strong board presence. Meanwhile, cards like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Murktide Regent provide powerful threats that can close out the game quickly if left unchecked.
